website_summaries.verdict: For consumers whose top concern is portability instead of features and overall quality, it's an OK choice.
pros: Extremely lightweight model that stands out for its portability
Universal design adjusts to fit most standard windows
cons: Doesn't have many bells and whistles
It's not reversible and only has 2 speeds
It's also noisy on the high setting

customer_reviews.title: Using it in the vertical position
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. We are using it to vent air from this room, and it works great! This is exactly what we were hoping for. I used a white foam board (Walmart) to extend the additional height above the unit. We rarely get rain towards that window, but if you do, you may want something more weatherproof, than just a foam board. UPDATE: It’s been 4 months later, and still going strong, used daily.
customer_reviews.author: Glen & Megan B

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for, get one for a little more $$!
customer_reviews.text: Within a month of purchasing mine started making noises, and sometimes it kicks down it's RPM's and then speeds up again. Hasn't been moved since I've got it, nothing caught on it, just an obnoxious rattling sound coming from it regardless of the position its in or how far the shutters pulled out. Bet it doesn't last much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Average Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great value & performance
customer_reviews.text: I've read many reviews complaining about noise...I don't know what these people expect. It make a perfectly acceptable amount of noise. It's not clicky or anything, it works perfectly. I use it in my bedroom, with the door closed, and it cooled my room to outdoor temperature in under 30 minutes. There is no remote control, who needs that?
customer_reviews.author: Dave Wales

customer_reviews.title: Fat fan with little power
customer_reviews.text: awful fan. don't fit in the window, too big. don't generate enough power. only two power levels. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin's Ghost

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome but because it moves a lot of air it can be a little loud. Not any louder then my last brand name one. If you're looking to vent or bring cool air in, it's well worth it. • it's also has a cover so that you can keep it in the window.
customer_reviews.author: Fratt

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, functional and very impressive
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and quiet. Came with two attachable stands and a cover for both sides. Alot better than expected
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Just a fan that costs too much
customer_reviews.text: This felt like a rip off. It’s a fan. I fell for “manual reverse” thinking it mean there was a button or switch instead of a remote. No. It means you manually turn the fan around and face it the other way - like every fan ever. This is a massive hassle, especially when not on the first floor. It has a flat bottom and top with no notch for the window to secure it so I wouldn’t use this on a multistory house or apartment. The accordion sides create a slight gap between the window and fan so bugs can get in. Totally disappointed. This fan should cost like $5.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Read reviews. Gave benefit of the doubt. DONT BOTHER.
customer_reviews.text: The fan is quiet. Wonderful. Is the air flow reversed? No. Does it cool the room? No. Actually size or the fan/blades. Max, 21/2”-3” The air flow is almost nonexistent. Im so incredibly disappointed. Putting it back in the box and sending it back first thing in the morning. (Received it today) So do so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Berrezueta

customer_reviews.title: Cool night breeze, better sleep
customer_reviews.text: Love this window fan. Arrived just in time as AC quit and we are entering a hot temperature stage. I cannot sleep when it is hot at night. This little fan, in a south bedroom window, brought in much cooler air. It is fairly quiet but, it is a fan. Only real problem I Could see someone might have problems with would be expanding the side panels if you have a particularly wind window, which we do. But was able to put it with one side expanded out and direct the fam toward the bed. Really love it and happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time/money
customer_reviews.text: Super slow shipping, pretty useless support and to top it off. If was useless after unboxing, doesn’t turn on. Tried multiple outlets that other products work just fine out of and nothing from this thing. Waited longer then usual when it came to prime shipping as I needed this asap and then to receive it dead on arrival was the icing on the cake. Be weary of this seller and product.
customer_reviews.author: Mr & Mrs. Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Comes with accessories
customer_reviews.text: I just got these. I stupidly thought 9" was the height and was happy because I needed something under 10". Still somehow managed to squeeze them into my windows, although slightly pointed down. They aren't loud at all and I'm very happy so far. I was surprised to see two different covers came with each and also feet. I actually do set my other ones on the floor or the table sometimes, but I have to prop them up. So these feet come in super handy.
customer_reviews.author: GinDz

customer_reviews.title: Came broken and already used
customer_reviews.text: Product came with a broken blade from one of the fans. Also had scratch marks and was dirty and places that it should not have been if this product was new. I would not recommend buying from this company and as you can see from other reviews they often ship products to customers that are already used and oftentimes do not even work. I will never buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Manual Reverse Option-Misleading function of fan.
customer_reviews.text: REVERSIBLE FUNCTION: Featuring a manual reverse option, this twin blade window fan can draw cool, fresh air into your home or push hot, stale air out of the room using the exhaust function. Can not have one fan intake and one fan outtake. Both fans operate in same direction only. Manual does not mean turn a switch from intake to outflow. You have physically turn the fan around in the window. Misleading function description. Might as well buy a box fan that has more power.
customer_reviews.author: Mark W Gehrke

customer_reviews.title: DEPENDABLE GOOD FAN!!
customer_reviews.text: I have this fan propped up sideways, top and bottom, straight up, on the corner of bed to blow towards me as I use the computer.....people, comfort zone fans are reliable and inexpensive....I have a stand fan being a work horse in the living room, going on 2 years now.....easy to use, quite on low setting, not too bad on high setting, for this two blade fan.....and these fans have a little fuse in the power cord that can be replaced....extraordinary protection and innovative!!! just get it and leave me alone, LOL...........
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Misleading/false description
customer_reviews.text: The description given was deliberately false and missleading. Claimed to have manual reversible airflow control, but in reality the only way to reverse the airflow is to physically remove the unit from the window, rotated 180°, and then remount it into the window. This is a one-way fan that needs to be mounted so that it blows or sucks the air in the direction that you want it to, not reversible unless you wish to reinstall each time you want to change the airflow. Dishonest wording, will not trust this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: A decent fan that fits the window well
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this fan for my garage primarily as an exhaust fan. It does a pretty good job but it is noisy even on the lowest setting. It is easy to set in the window and seals in pretty good. If there is no screen the seal won't keep many bugs out, but it fits behind the screen in my window and does fine.
customer_reviews.author: D Marquis

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: This fan is too deep for a standard window. It pushes the screen out and will eventually stretch or tear. Upon noticing this, I tried to return the fan, but would have had to pay return shipping and a restocking fee. I emailed the company to tell them of the design problem and see if I could return rather than writing a negative review, but the company never responded.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: It is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I use this fan in my kitchen window to exhaust the heat from cookin since I don’t have central ac. The screen is keeping the blades clean and that is a good thing. The only thing I don’t love like about this is the fact that it has to be reversed manually if I want to do that. It’s not a big deal though.
customer_reviews.author: grams

customer_reviews.title: Description is WAY OFF
customer_reviews.text: I am returning this fan...it describes the product as being a powerful and quiet fan being felt across the room...we don't feel it from 3 feet away. It is a waste of money and in trying to return it, I can find no actual number in order to contact the store. There was a supposed email address on packing but no response. They are deducting shipping costs from my method of payment even though their product description and working condition is not at all correct.
customer_reviews.author: Ann W.Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Low air flow on high - why bother
customer_reviews.text: I like the manual controls (vs digitial) so that I could potential hook it up to a timer. However the low air floor made the fan almost useless. Additional, 20% restocking fee, plus shipping both ways made this small basic fan much more expensive then a larger, better built fan.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Prince

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. a low rumble that vibrated it out of the window and broke on the floor 15 minutes into first use. DO NOT BUY THIS FAN!
customer_reviews.author: Frank J. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design flaws. Terrible customer service.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst window exhaust fan I have ever owned. Every other window exhaust fan of similar construction has lips on top that sit on either side of the windowsill, and/ or holes where you can actually screw it in place. Since this one has no such options, if it gets windy outside the fan falls out! It’s fine if it falls out towards the screen, but I’d prefer it to not continue to damage the screen! If it falls into the room, it’s kind of a pain. Oh, and the customer service is trash. I tried to return this item, and they refused. I have never had a seller on Amazon refuse a return.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Long

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a little extra airflow/ventilation for my home office, so I looked around for a cheap solution. This was it! It took seconds to install - the noise level is minimal (not silence, but quite bearable) - still let's airflow through even when it's turned off. The intake cover was a plus that comes in very handy if it gets cold outside. Thank you - it's not an expensive model, but it works great for me!
customer_reviews.author: HRGable

customer_reviews.title: Well built, powerful and quiet
customer_reviews.text: Great for its price! This fan works for the space and use I need. My video will show there are two different settings: low and high. For some reason my video makes the sound echoes but in reality this fan is quieter. It is also powerful thus well built
customer_reviews.author: Green Moss

customer_reviews.title: I ordered two and am considering another
customer_reviews.text: We are in the middle of a hot, humid stretch so I ordered window fans. Apparently I didn't read close enough because I was pleasantly surprised that it arrived with a bug screen and a humidity screen. You cannot run the fan with the humidity screen on (it makes the fan almost airtight, keeping the humidity out) but I ran the fan all night and then slipped on that screen today, and my room is still comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Roy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It's lightweight. Easy to install. Not too loud but not whisper quiet either. The wife doesn't smoke but I do. I don't smoke in the house except the game room. Even so the smell works it's way down the hallway. I place this unit in the window, crack the door so the fan can pull air. Now she doesn't smell smoke and I get peace. Well worth the 30 bucks I'd say.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Hinds

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Be aware of return policy. We needed to return our order as it didn’t fit our window. It would have cost over double ($75) to return as the only way to get free return is if the product is damaged or defective. Highly disappointing. I will never use this company again. The fan is loud (we have another brand that is much quieter, we should have stuck with them)
customer_reviews.author: Daniella

customer_reviews.title: The worst product and worst customer service I have ever seen
customer_reviews.text: I wish there is less one star It is very bad and when I tried to return it they deducted 40 % shipping fees and the customer service was very bad. Bottom line don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I should have got a better one
customer_reviews.text: It works, and it moves a good amount of air. The extendy pieces on the sides actually stay in place which is nice. Its also loud, even on low (theres only 2 speeds). You cant reverse the airflow without spinning it around. The screens are a neat idea but awkward to install, I'm not sure what the point of the "heavy" one is since its faster to just remove the fan and close the window than try to put that thing on.
customer_reviews.author: qovneob

customer_reviews.title: not powerful enough
customer_reviews.text: The fan was too small for most of the windows in my house, does install nicely into windows that it does fit. The cover is a nice touch allows for the fan to be installed once and left in place when not in use. Doesn't blow much air and struggles sometimes to spin when there is a good hard breeze. It might be an okay solution if you have a shoe box room, but it just doesn't have enough power for any normal or large room sizes. Cannot recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: BTC

customer_reviews.title: Are there jets taking off?
customer_reviews.text: Talk about loud. Don't put in a room where you need to hear anything, this includes the low setting.
customer_reviews.author: BBS818

customer_reviews.title: Inoperative out of the box
customer_reviews.text: This fan unit did not work out of the box, fan motors sparked when plugged in, a very potential fire hazard, very concerned.
customer_reviews.author: thnuke

customer_reviews.title: Quiet window fan
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped that it would move more air through the window than the fan I already had since this one would fit better and not allow air back in the reverse direction on the other side of the window. I was disappointed though since it didn't do what I wanted. I think the fan is fine, just not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: safety man

customer_reviews.title: Great fan.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and adjust to window size. I have ran for a month straight time and it still works like new and is very quiet. Puts out great airflow and has 3 speed adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: broken out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Broken pieces in the box. It does not turn on. I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPlatinumCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Loud and unwieldy.
customer_reviews.text: The fan is "manually reversible," meaning, apparently, you can turn it around. That's true of any fan with a cover on both sides! It's so loud it's oppressive, even on the lowest setting (of which there are only two. The two fans do not work independently.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Yocum

customer_reviews.title: Great fan to assist with exhausting kitchen while frying fish or chicken!
customer_reviews.text: I use this fan when frying to pull out the smells of fish and seafood. It works great in addition to the stove fan. The house does not get the fishy or grease smell as much with assistance from this fan. It has moderate noise when on but tolerable. The blades turn in one direction so you flip the fan around to bring in fresh air and flip it again to exhaust. It has clear writing on it to tell you which is which. Great product! Worth the money so far!
customer_reviews.author: Rob B

customer_reviews.title: Cute....
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because I believed that I didnt have to take it put of the window to change from "air in" to "air out". The last window fan I had, I didnt have to move it until I was ready to. On the other hand, it has these covers that are cute. Complicated but cute nonetheless. Wish the actual fan blades were longer so that I can feel more of a breeze but it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Shalonda Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Works great! And nice too
customer_reviews.text: I love that the shutters open on both sides so that I can block in the fan. It's great because if the kitchen gets too smelly I can vent it out. (Some people don't like the smell of garlic... Go figure.) But this fan is perfect for the kitchen and stretches on the sides to fit!
customer_reviews.author: Silky Seams

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had window fans before and the concept is great. This one is very well made. I don’t know why Amazon gives you a bunch of choices in the $50 range and you have to hunt and peck for this one. It does the job perfectly for $29. Don’t waste your money on the more expensive ones .
customer_reviews.author: Belle CP

customer_reviews.title: starting to fail already
customer_reviews.text: Put in window. been using a few weeks. One side fan is real slow to start for 3-4 minutes.. fan motor starting to fail Like the fan motor is worn out already..
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Misleading!
customer_reviews.text: The name is misleading. I was expecting to get a fan with reverable blades or at least one side blowing with the other blowing out. Instead I got a fan that I could do the same with a $10 window fan. You have to turn the whole fan to blow in oppiste direction and both blades blow the same way. Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy from this seller!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product is inadequate to handle exhaust air with only two speeds. Fans are very weak. Wanted to return item. Seller charges 20% restocking fee and DOES NOT offer free return shipping. NEVER AGAIN with this seller.
customer_reviews.author: ndl

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: The fan works great, we use ours in the kitchen to exhaust cooking fumes in our tiny cottage rental. Before the smoke alarm would constantly go off while frying foods but not anymore! The fan is quiet set on low speed but a little noisy on the high setting.
customer_reviews.author: supermex

customer_reviews.title: Basic fan with no bells and whistles
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted, simplicity and minimal things to go wrong. The fans will be "noisy" on high, but that is expected for this price range. Quality is great. Turn the unit around to reverse. Comes with screen and cover.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Not quiet, not bug proof
customer_reviews.text: The fan is not quiet I've heard louder but if you're thinking this is a silent fan, no. The "bug proofing" is severely lacking as the mesh does cover the fan opening itself however it leaves huge gaps around the bottom and top where the controls are that can let in all kinds of bugs of all sizes. I jerry-rigged some cardboard that I cut to fit those spots but you are going to have to do some work to "bug proof" the fan and even then I'm not convinced.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Freeman-Hogan

customer_reviews.title: feels like false advertisement
customer_reviews.text: It says its manually reversable - which means you have to take it out of the window and put it in the other way. Also will not stay in the window at all - depends on the accordion flaps. It fell out of my window and broke something that meant something to me. Dont buy this piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: bradley d hector

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't actually fit into a window, especially one with a screen.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a window fan to exchange hot inside air with cool outside air. This unit moves very little air. It doesn't fit into a window with a screen and when I removed the screen there were multiple gaps around the unit. Twenty minutes after my first try the room had mosquitoes. I can't recommend this fan as a window unit.
customer_reviews.author: David Irvin

customer_reviews.title: Not very secure.
customer_reviews.text: It sure why the review asks about how warm it is or strength? It’s pretty cheaply made but ok for the price. Would be better it it had a slot for the widow to slide into. Does not stay in place very well.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: One fan stopped working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: one fan stopped working after about 3 months of use. Return window is expired. Not happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Denise Sabia

customer_reviews.title: Works well if you don't want to reverse the air flow
customer_reviews.text: The fan works well for my purpose. However the blades don't reverse so you have to physically rotate the fan to change the direction of the air flow. I could reverse the air flow on my last fan just by turning a knob.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It is very quiet. I run this fan every day all day and night to keep airflow in my tool shed.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Rocanello

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed it for!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a cousin who smokes in the bathroom, smells up the whole house unless this is in the window.....it pulls out all the smoke and makes being in the house so much better. I would buy it again and again.
customer_reviews.author: kakejobry

customer_reviews.title: Powerful & Quiet
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 other fans like this previously, and this one (for $10.00 more) is very well worth it. It's more than double efficient, and at least twice as quiet. I just ordered another one.
customer_reviews.author: Trippy

customer_reviews.title: Not fit my window
customer_reviews.text: This model is not design to stand on your window securely. It keeps falling down from my window. Very annoying because I have to put some stuff to hold it. I end up with returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: both fans to do work
customer_reviews.text: I just received this fan tonight. only one fan side is working.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Beat the heat
customer_reviews.text: It's worth the money I have 4 of these , works well . Each room is going to have it's own different temperature, due to installation of the walls and windows,over all it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Toetoe

customer_reviews.title: Super  sized  window  fan
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fan = if you want a little air movement at night to help pul the cooler air in / or move the hotter air out :) love this fan = works great
customer_reviews.author: Wazooal77

customer_reviews.title: Surprised Me
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far! Was surprised to find out that in addition to the inside cover it also came with a protective screen for the outside to keep out dust! Love it! ❤️❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: CherubMimi

customer_reviews.title: Good basic fan
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and light. That's not a bad thing. Works well no bells and whistles. If u need a window fan to move air it works . Liked it comes with feet clips to use out of the window if needed. Good feature .
customer_reviews.author: Ms1872

customer_reviews.title: Worst Buy Ever
customer_reviews.text: Worst product ever. It doesn't work. Poor air quality. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita Marlow

customer_reviews.title: Great window vent!!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect to keep in the window year around and u get circulation at the flick of the switch
customer_reviews.author: Nich Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Need to update description, misleading
customer_reviews.text: Kind of misleading description, you actually have to remove the fan and turn it around to reverse the flow of air. Wish I would have known this before I bought it
customer_reviews.author: William A Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Good and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice little fan good and sturdy. Fan didn't fit even with measurements, I miscalculated the span. However a set of attachable feet came with the fan so it can sit stationary. That being said I will keep it.
customer_reviews.author: DRM

customer_reviews.title: Fan flow works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Unit does not fill. 36” wide opening Falls out of window. Not a tight fit Site flow is what was is expected and reduced smoke from room.
customer_reviews.author: Arcuri

customer_reviews.title: Fit in a slider window
customer_reviews.text: Fit a slider window, I was surprised. A it loud but the performance makes up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothea Magney

customer_reviews.title: This is a waste of your money
customer_reviews.text: No power and can barely feel the breeze. Cheap quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable fan!
customer_reviews.text: This fan is perfect for my living room, those noise level isn't bothersome for me personally. It was easy to install and use right away. Definitely made a difference for my living room, it made the room cooler and the air feels more circulated. The mesh net also come in handy to stop flies and mosquitoes coming in. This fan is definitely practical and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: This is just great for my smaller trailer that I live in. it works great. It fits in the window by me propping it up. It's not that noisy either.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Left side fan stalled and now just humms.
customer_reviews.text: The left side motor has stalled and now makes a humming noise. Only been in used about a 40-45 days. I would advise avoiding.
customer_reviews.author: L. Byrd

customer_reviews.title: junk !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sorry will never but another product of your the fan I perchanced from you one side stopped working after about a month and it make lots of noise and tried to contact them with no luck . my last window fan lasted me over twenty years. vary disappointed and a wast of 40 bucks .
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Is not reversible
customer_reviews.text: Misleading product description. ANY fan is theoretically "reversible" if you spin it 180 degrees to face in the opposite direction, which is what this fan requires - you have to physically remove it from window and turn it to blow in the opposite direction. A true "reversible" fan has a control setting where you can select which way the motor(s) spin to determine if the fan is pushing or pulling air. Look elsewhere if you want a true reversible fan.
customer_reviews.author: RONALD PEPIN

customer_reviews.title: Not reversible
customer_reviews.text: The description tries to hint that this is reversible, it’s not unless you take it out of the window and flip it. There is no switch to flip the direction.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: it is what I wanted and works good.
customer_reviews.text: need 2 hands to put in the window, I dropped it out and caught it before it hit the ground. used a flat screw driver to raise the end fittings to give a tight fit in window. It really works great for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control requirement
customer_reviews.text: The first fan I received was defective as only one fan operated when switched on. I requested a replacement and I quickly received it. Upon installing the unit the fan operated properly and I have noted an improvement in the comfort in the room. I do wish that the first fan had been tested before packing so as to avoid the problem of having to return and replacing the first unit.
customer_reviews.author: duluth dawson

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t know that that either side is exhaust or fresh air in. I assumed that you could have exhaust or fresh air but you actually have to turn the entire fan around. Not sure what the difference is between this and a simple box fan... just turn it around
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Bought two, but one lost one fan just after return date
customer_reviews.text: Got two units. One lost one fan just after 30 return window. Sending it back under warranty would cost as much as another.
customer_reviews.author: R. Livingood

customer_reviews.title: After 6 months, no problems
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is... for the money, its a good buy and have had it on almost all the time for 6 months. The cleanable screen is a great plus.
customer_reviews.author: Vodknockers

customer_reviews.title: Misleading description
customer_reviews.text: It says it’s reversible which technically it’s not It doesn’t have a reversible switch you have to literally take it out of the window and turn it around to be reversible I feel the description is misleading
customer_reviews.author: Robin Gouty

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little noisy but works well to push air out or bring it in. It’s in expensive but I think it’s worth the price. Just a good basic fan
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for price
customer_reviews.text: I like it came with the screen covers for fan. Only thing not so happy with is it doesn't have reverse. Other than that pretty good value.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Sounded like it was falling apart after a week.
customer_reviews.text: Whining, noisy, sounded like it was falling apart after one week. So back to Holmes - which runs like a clock.
customer_reviews.author: Puppy

customer_reviews.title: Portable twin window fan.
customer_reviews.text: This works very well for drawing air from outside in my small kitchen window. Not much good as an exhaust fan.
customer_reviews.author: D. Bermudez

customer_reviews.title: Not so good but it works
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect much for the price. The fans are pretty loud but my biggest concern is that there is no way to lock the top of the fan down so it sits and stays in place. If the wind blows the fan slips out a bit causing readjustment. Edit: don't bother using it vertically with sides extended, it collapses under it's own weight.
customer_reviews.author: Anime fan 213

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Not like the old metal ones. Sigh. But I especially like the screen and “cover” that can be attached. We have caught a few small bugs in that screen.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Schweizer

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Great fan and does cool off the room, didn’t realize you have to turn the fan around for the exhaust option. Would have gave 5 stars if each fan went in separate directions. I’d say it’s noisy but I need noise to sleep so for me personally it’s fine. However the length is a little too short for normal standard windows
customer_reviews.author: JayGrave

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good  :)
customer_reviews.text: Got this to help get smoke out of the garage when we are cooking on the Blackstone... It does the job!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great fan and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I really like this fan. It has the sides that cover the window. The net that covers the back is great too. It really cools good. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm, and is easy to set up in a window and easy to remove. High mode could be less noisy, though.
customer_reviews.author: L. C.

customer_reviews.title: Great fan
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fan. It comes with legs, so it can be used sitting on the floor or a table not just in a window.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Had the fan for about 2 weeks and then one of the fans stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Koree Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: It’s meh
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t feel like it moves that much air. I had one of these dual fan window units before and it was much more effective than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony DiVeronica

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY loud and only 3 of the 4 I ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: EXTREMELY loud and only 3 of the 4 I ordered worked....
customer_reviews.author: Nicole B.

customer_reviews.title: Decent fan
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably priced, relatively quiet. I only wish it would fit better in the window - it doesn't have stops or grooves to prevent if from vibrating back into the screen or out into the room. It relies only on the pressure of the window to keep it in place. Overall a good fan.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Peterman

customer_reviews.title: It works, but maybe not the way you think.
customer_reviews.text: The fan blows air one way. So depending on how you want to use it, you may have to turn it around every so often. It is very quiet though which is a nice plus! I purchased mine about a month or so ago and it’s been on the entire time with absolutely no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo Z.

customer_reviews.title: Ok but expanders aren't very strong
customer_reviews.text: It works ok but the expanders aren't strong enough to hold open in the window
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: A must buy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought another one after buying one. Fits great and keeps house cool with the dual fans. Fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley mauk

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I bought this. It works great and fits the window just right.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good little window fan!
customer_reviews.text: It works really good! Good value for the money. I like it has two settings for air flow. Air flow is very good. It exhausts in and out which was what I was looking for. It is not however for larger windows even with the Extension panels fully pulled out. You should know it is on the louder side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best price
customer_reviews.text: I had twin fans i bought in the eighties i needed to replace them so i bought 3 sets of fans, they are the best for their price and they work real good im pleased!
customer_reviews.author: lorraine L.

product_meta.title: Comfort Zone CZ319WT 9-inch Twin Window Fan with Manual Reversible Airflow Control, Auto-Locking Expanders and 2-Speed Fan Switch
product_meta.description: 2-Speed Airflow Output Designed for ultimate versatility, this Comfort Zone 9" Portable Twin Window Fan offers two speed functions that can generate a strong breeze or circulate the air in your home with ease. The output is controlled with the manual dial, allowing you to adjust the airflow by simply turning the switch. The twin fan design offers added power and helps fill your environment with fresh, cool air. Auto-Locking Expanders Equipped with auto-locking according expanders on the sides, this twin airflow window fan easily adjusts to fit the width of your window. These expanders are suitable for windows between 22-1/2" and 33" wide, providing a snug, secure fit. Reversible Exhaust Function Not only can this twin blade window fan fill your home office, bedroom or living room with cool air, but it can also be reversed to push hot, stale air out from your home. This exhaust function is especially useful for combating hot, humid air. Simply adjust the exhaust or air intake function depending on your environment. Protection from Bugs, Debris and Air Leaks With a removable fabric cover, this twin window fan with reversible airflow control keeps bugs, dust, and debris from entering your home through the fan itself. For added insulation, this cover also prevents hot air from entering your home, even when the fan is not in use. Portable and Convenient Featuring a carrying handle, this twin speed window fan can be moved from room to room and window to window with ease. For added convenience, this fan also features two sturdy feet for tabletop use on your desk or bedside table.
feature_bullets: 2-SPEED DIAL CONTROL: Choose between low or high air output options on this twin speed window fan to create gentle airflow or a brisk breeze.
AUTO-LOCKING ACCORDION EXPANDERS: This twin airflow window fan features auto-locking expanders, which can expand between 22-1/4" and 33" for a snug fit.
REVERSIBLE FUNCTION: Featuring a manual reverse option, this twin blade window fan can draw cool, fresh air into your home or push hot, stale air out of the room using the exhaust function.
REMOVABLE COVER: The removable fabric cover protects against keeps bugs and debris out while also preventing hot, humid air from entering your home even when the fan is not in use.
VERSATILE DESIGN: With 2 sturdy feet for tabletop use and a carrying handle for added portability, this twin blade window fan is convenient enough for use throughout your home.
